messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

please block sender begin forwarded date december secure secure please find attached secure please review complete return completed via relating feel free please note must enable content order view secure confidentiality note information contained transmitted communication strictly confidential intended intended recipient affiliates subsidiaries intended recipient hereby notified information contained transmitted communication dissemination copying communication strictly prohibited by received communication error please immediately return communication delete copy possession

I'm currently focused on classifying an IT ticket. The description mentions blocking senders and security protocols like confidentiality, strongly suggesting an "Access" related category, perhaps even a new one specifically for email security.

However, the specific nature of email security suggests it might warrant a more granular sub-category if available, or further investigation into the breadth of the "Access" classification.
